mamview_error Class Reference
[MAMView Extraction Module]

#include <stMAMView.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 mamview_error (const string &what_arg)

Detailed Description

This exception occurs when something goes wrong with the stMAMViewExtractor.

The occurrence of this exception must be avoided at all costs because it indicates that the use of stMAMViewExtractor is not correct.

Author:
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino@icmc.sc.usp.br)
Version:
1.0
